com.revivedstandards.view

Interface Updatable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnimatedPlayerGameObject, BrickGameObject, BulletGameObject, RainController, SpaceLevel, StandardBoxParticle, StandardCamera, StandardCollisionHandler, StandardDragParticle, StandardGameObject, StandardHandler, StandardLevel, StandardParticle, StandardParticleHandler, StandardTrail, TriangleGameObject, UserInterface

    public interface Updatable
    Updatable is the interface denoting which objects have the ability to update information about themselves or other objects within their respective class to the game loop.
